LightningComponentBundle.description: A simple GDS footer that can be used at the bottom of a community page.

property.name: metalinksRequired
property.label: Enable Footer with links to Meta information
property.description: Check the checkbox if you want footer with links as meta information and fill below 2 fields.

property.name: crestRequired
property.label: Enable Footer with Crown Logo
property.description: Check the checkbox if you want footer with Crown Logo

property.name: metalinkNames
property.label: Meta Information Link Names
property.description: Please provide semicolon list of the display names to the links

property.name: metalinkURLs
property.label: Meta Information Link URL's
property.description: Please provide semicolon list of the links in same order corresponding to the above mentioned names

property.name: secondaryNavigationRequired
property.label: Enable Footer Secondary Navigation link
property.description: Check the checkbox if you want a footer with titled columns and links below them

property.name: doubleColumnHeader
property.label: Double Column list header
property.description: Please provide the relevant header for the double column list in the footer

property.name: singleColumnHeader
property.label: Single Column list header
property.description: Please provide the relevant header for the single column list in the footer

property.name: singleColumnNames
property.label: Single Column Meta Information Link Names
property.description: Please provide semicolon list of the display names to the links

property.name: singleColumnURLs
property.label: Single Column Meta Information Link URL's
property.description: Please provide semicolon list of the links in same order corresponding to the above mentioned names

property.name: doubleColumnNames
property.label: Double Column Meta Information Link Names
property.description: Please provide semicolon list of the display names to the links

property.name: doubleColumnURLs
property.label: Double Column Meta Information Link URL's
property.description: Please provide semicolon list of the links in same order corresponding to the above mentioned names

property.name: footerCustomText
property.label: Footer Custom Text Value
property.description: Please enter some text you would like in the footer

property.name: footerCustomLinkText
property.label: Footer Custom Link Text Value
property.description: Please enter some text you would like in the footer specifically for the link

property.name: footerCustomLink
property.label: Footer Custom Link Value
property.description: Please enter the relevant link for the footer custom text

property.name: visuallyHiddenLinksText
property.label: Metalinks hidden heading text
property.description: Please enter relevant text to describe the metalinks provided
